entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
